name: actions_set-selected-repos-to-required-workflow
description:
Sets the repositories for a required workflow that is required for selected repositories.

You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:org` scope to use this endpoint.

For more information, see "[Required Workflows](https://docs.github.com/actions/using-workflows/required-workflows)."

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

required_workflow_id.description: The unique identifier of the required workflow.

selected_repository_ids.description: The IDs of the repositories for which the workflow should be required.
